Looking for a good NZ social media consultant to work with tourism business. Suggestions?
@jessedee Well it is the coolest little capital in the world! ;-) Would love to show you round, get in touch if you make it down this way!
So how is it I can travel all through SEAsia & get free wireless, but here in a rather nice Rotorua hotel they boot me out after 20 mins?
Awesome group of ppl @ #PRINZ11. Luvd Duncan Stewart's talk - random networks, sticky marbles & flocks of starlings - all PR truths...
@jessedee loved ur talk @ #prinz just now. V inspiring! Will send suck @ ppt 2 all my workmates ;)
V proud of my desk-buddy @blairhillyard , who's on his way down to #christchurch with SPCA's Animal Rescue Unit #eqnz Stay safe!
Feeling pretty sick to my stomach watching the footage from #Christchurch. Thoughts with everyone down there...
